it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.shingle

Class ShingleExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.shingle.ShingleExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Shingle>

    public class ShingleExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Shingle>
    ShingleExtractor extracts all the ngrams (of fixed length) from the text of an article. Please observe that the ShingleExtractor perform a cleaning step over each shingle using the standard spot cleaner. Each shingle produced could be different but the 'original' fragment, but it contains the original start/end position in the original test.
    Author:
    Salvatore Trani, salvatore.trani@isti.cnr.it created on 02/aug/2012, Diego Ceccarelli modified to make it thread safe on 11/july/2014
    See Also:
    Shingle, SpotManager
